title: Trailblazer for Truth
description:
Born a slave but freed by the Civil War, Ida B. Wells was a force to be reckoned with as a writer and teacher. But the lynching of a friend set her on a path that would have long-lasting impacts on American society.

Follow Marie Benedict on Instagram, order her novels, and learn more about her work at authormariebenedict.com 

Follow Victoria Christopher-Murray on Instagram and Facebook

To see more of Victoria’s work, head to her website: victoriachristophermurray.com 

Our Week of Women illustration is by Nina Chhita: @nina.draws.scientists
